bannerTitle: A Text and Document Assistant based on ChatGPT
bannerDesc: No VPN required, supports GPT-3/GPT-4, supports custom Prompt plugins, document auto-completion, bookmarking Q&A, one-click save to Notion
productPrice.title: Product Price
productNotice.desc: Alipay, WeChat payments currently only support one-time payment
PriceDesc: Use as many tokens as you need, pay as you go!
FeaturesDescription: Q&A, text processing, bookmarking, custom Prompt templates
ChatDesc: Supports chained conversations, supports GPT-3, ChatGPT-4, and other dialogue models
DocsDesc: Supports document auto-completion, URL content extraction, Markdown, and other document types
StarDesc: Supports saving conversations, Q&A content, and one-click save to Notion
PluginDesc: Supports Prompt template plugins, custom dialogue templates
